text.v: Hóa đơn nhập mua - xuất thẳng

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @duplicateExRate nvarchar(512), @inputVATDuplicate nvarchar(512), @inputVATExists nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8), @voucherIDIssue varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @tax varchar(16) declare @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime, @taxProperty varchar(3), @voucherTemplate varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int declare @roundPrice int, @roundPriceFC int, @roundAmount int, @roundAmountFC int, @checkInputVAT bit, @taxPost char(1) select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$', @detail = 'd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$', @general = 'c&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;', @tax = 'r&Tax;$', @voucherIDIssue = '&CodeIssue;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s1; đã tồn tại.' else '&s2; already exists.' end select @duplicateExRate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s1; có ngoại tệ hoặc tỷ giá nhập hơn một lần.' else '&s2;, currency or exchange rate already exists.' end select @inputVATExists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s3; đã được cập nhật trong phần thuế đầu vào.' else '&s4; already exists in Input VAT data.' end select @inputVATDuplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s3; trùng nhau trong chi tiết thuế đầu vào.' else '&s4; already exists in Input VAT data.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundPriceFC = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia_nt' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @roundAmountFC = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_nt' select @taxProperty = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_tc_thue' select @voucherTemplate = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_mau_ct_dv' if not exists(select 1 from dmmauct where ma_mau_ct = @voucherTemplate) select @voucherTemplate = '' if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_kthd_tdv' and val = '1') select @checkInputVAT = 1 else select @checkInputVAT = 0 select @taxPost = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_post_tax_yn' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking &CommandCheckTaxCodeImport; update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end end -- Update update @@table set so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)), dvt = case when a.dvt <> '' then a.dvt else b.dvt end, &UnitUpload.General; ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk = case when a.tk <> '' then a.tk else c.tk end, tk_vt = case when a.tk_vt <> '' then a.tk_vt else b.tk_vt end, tk_cpxt = case when a.tk_cpxt <> '' then a.tk_cpxt else d.tk end, ma_tt = case when a.ma_tt <> '' then a.ma_tt else c.ma_tt end from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmkh c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh left join dmnx d on a.ma_nx = d.ma_nx select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, user_id0 as id into #unit from c&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho group by b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct -- Checking if @check$Unit = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin select b.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt as id into #unitmode from @@table a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', id, 'C002' from #unitmode a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(id) from #unit a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from #unit where id = @r return end end end -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; -- Checking @@checking(1); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end select @field = 'ma_kho' if @admin <> 1 begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00001' from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from dmkho c where a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)) &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from dmkho c where a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1))&Error; end &SiteRight; end @@checking(2); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C010' from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #table b where a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.stt <> b.stt and (a.ty_gia <> b.ty_gia or a.ma_nt <> b.ma_nt)) &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #table b where a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.stt <> b.stt and (a.ty_gia <> b.ty_gia or a.ma_nt <> b.ma_nt)) if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicateExRate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end @@checking(3); update @@table set mau_bc = case when mau_bc = '' then '3' else mau_bc end, ma_tc = case when ma_tc = '' then @taxProperty else ma_tc end, ma_mau_ct = case when ma_mau_ct = '' then @voucherTemplate else ma_mau_ct end, ma_kh_i = case when ma_kh_i = '' then ma_kh else ma_kh_i end, so_ct0_i = case when so_ct0_i = '' then so_ct0 else so_ct0_i end, ngay_ct0_i = case when ngay_ct0_i is null then ngay_ct0 else ngay_ct0_i end, so_seri0_i = case when so_seri0_i = '' then so_seri0 else so_seri0_i end where ma_thue <> '' update @@table set tk_thue_no = case when a.tk_thue_no <> '' then a.tk_thue_no else b.tk_thue_no3 end from @@table a left join dmthue b on a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue where a.ma_thue <> '' update @@table set ten_kh_i = case when a.ten_kh_i <> '' then a.ten_kh_i else b.ten_kh end, dia_chi_i = case when a.dia_chi_i <> '' then a.dia_chi_i else b.dia_chi end, ma_so_thue = case when a.ma_so_thue <> '' then a.ma_so_thue else rtrim(b.ma_so_thue) end from @@table a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh_i = b.ma_kh where a.ma_thue <> '' @@checking(4); -- Check Input VAT if @checkInputVAT = 1 begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct0_i', a.stt, 'C008' from @@table a join @@table b on a.so_ct0_i = b.so_ct0_i and a.so_seri0_i = b.so_seri0_i and a.ngay_ct0_i = b.ngay_ct0_i and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue where a.ngay_ct <> b.ngay_ct or a.so_ct <> b.so_ct group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join @@table b on a.so_ct0_i = b.so_ct0_i and a.so_seri0_i = b.so_seri0_i and a.ngay_ct0_i = b.ngay_ct0_i and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue where a.ngay_ct <> b.ngay_ct or a.so_ct <> b.so_ct group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@inputVATDuplicate, '%s1', so_ct0_i), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct0_i', a.stt, 'C009' from @@table a join ctgt30 b with (index(c)) on a.so_ct0_i = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0_i = b.so_seri0 and a.ngay_ct0_i = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join ctgt30 b with (index(c)) on a.so_ct0_i = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0_i = b.so_seri0 and a.ngay_ct0_i = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@inputVATExists, '%s1', so_ct0_i), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end end @@checking(5); &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking;&EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; -- select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.dvt, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt0, a.gia0, a.gia_nt, a.gia, a.tien_nt0, a.tien0, a.tien_nt, a.tien, a.thue_nt, a.thue, a.tt_nt, a.tt, a.tk_vt, a.ma_nx, a.tk_cpxt, a.px_gia_dd, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku, cast(0 as int) as r into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 a, dmvt b insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.dvt, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt0, round(a.gia_nt0 * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.gia_nt0, round(a.gia_nt0 * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.tien_nt0, round(a.tien_nt0 * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.tien_nt0, round(a.tien_nt0 * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), round(a.t_tien_nt * isnull(d.thue_suat, 0) / 100, case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundAmount else @roundAmountFC end), round(a.t_tien_nt * isnull(d.thue_suat, 0) * a.ty_gia / 100, @roundAmount), 0, 0, c.tk_vt, a.ma_nx, a.tk_cpxt, &PGMasterLisFieldValues.ext;, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku, case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then @roundPrice else @roundPriceFC end from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ma_dvcs, loai_ct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, so_seri0, ma_thue, thue_suat, t_tien_nt, t_tien, t_thue_nt, t_thue, ma_tt, tk_thue_no, tk_du, mau_bc, ma_tc, ma_mau_ct, ma_kh, ten_kh, dia_chi, ma_so_thue, ma_kh2, ten_vt, ghi_chu, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, ma_nt, ty_gia into #r&Tax; from r&Tax;$000000 insert into #r&Tax; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, c.ma_dvcs, '2', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ngay_ct0_i, a.so_ct0_i, a.so_seri0_i, a.ma_thue, isnull(d.thue_suat, 0), a.t_tien_nt, round(a.t_tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.t_thue_nt, round(a.t_thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), '', a.tk_thue_no, a.tk, a.mau_bc, a.ma_tc, a.ma_mau_ct, a.ma_kh_i, a.ten_kh_i, a.dia_chi_i, a.ma_so_thue, a.ma_kh2, a.ten_vt, a.ghi_chu, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_vv else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_bp else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.so_lsx else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_sp else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_hd else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_phi else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_ku else '' end, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt where (a.ma_thue <> '') order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt -- Allocate if exists(select 1 from #r&Tax;) begin exec AI_ERP$App$Allocate$Table '#d&Detail;', '#r&Tax;', 'thue_nt', 't_thue_nt', 'm_round_tien_nt', 'tien_nt0', '1 = 1', 'stt_rec0', 'stt_rec' exec AI_ERP$App$Allocate$Table '#d&Detail;', '#r&Tax;', 'thue', 't_thue', 'm_round_tien', 'tien0', '1 = 1', 'stt_rec0', 'stt_rec' end update #d&Detail; set he_so = b.he_so from #d&Detail; a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 update #d&Detail; set tk_vt = c.tk_dl from #d&Detail; a join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt where b.dai_ly_yn = 1 and c.tk_dl <> '' update #d&Detail; set tt = tien + thue, tt_nt = tien_nt + thue_nt select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, so_seri0, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, tk, tk_thue_no, ma_kh, ma_kh_x, dien_giai, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_so_luong, t_tien_nt, t_tien, t_tt_nt, t_tt, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_tien_nt0, t_tien0, ma_tt into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, c.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.so_seri0, a.ngay_ct0, a.so_ct0, a.tk, a.tk_thue_no, a.ma_kh, a.ma_kh_x, a.dien_giai, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, d.t_so_luong, d.t_tien_nt, d.t_tien, d.t_tt_nt, d.t_tt, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue, d.t_tien_nt0, d.t_tien0, a.ma_tt from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join (select stt_rec, sum(so_luong) as t_so_luong, sum(tien_nt) as t_tien_nt, sum(tien) as t_tien, sum(tt_nt) as t_tt_nt, sum(tt) as t_tt, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue, sum(tien_nt0) as t_tien_nt0, sum(tien0) as t_tien0 from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, e$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#15$' + '2' + '#20$' + rtrim(tk) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '', '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'ma_kho, ma_vt, tk_vt', '#10$, #20$, #30$', 'stt_rec', default, default, '&Code;', 'e$', 1) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert declare @p varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128) declare @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @taxTable varchar(32) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p, @taxTable = @tax + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q if exists(select 1 from #r&Tax;) begin select @q = @@inserting(tax, @taxTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q end select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q -- &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting; declare @External nvarchar(4000), @Statement nvarchar(4000), @Numeric varchar(4000), @String varchar(4000), @fieldSelect varchar(4000) declare @glGroupReceipt varchar(128), @glGroupIssue varchar(128), @glAcctField varchar(128), @glAcctFieldRef varchar(128), @glAmountField varchar(128), @glFCAmountField varchar(128), @glKey varchar(512), @glNoAccList varchar(128), @glNoAccListRef varchar(128), @cNoAccounts varchar(128), @maxLineNumber int if @status <> '0' begin declare @ct_yn tinyint select @ct_yn = cast(val as tinyint) from options where name = 'm_po_tt' select @cNoAccounts = replace(rtrim(val), '''', '''''') from options where name = 'm_tk_tk_vt' -- By Detail select a.* into #detailpost from #d&Detail; a where a.line_nbr = 1 and (@ct_yn = 0 or not exists (select 1 from #r&Tax; t where a.stt_rec = t.stt_rec)) select @String = 'so_dh, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' select @Numeric = 'nam, ky, t_nk, t_cp, t_cp_nt, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6' select @External = 'status = ''' + @status + ''', ma_ct = ''' + @voucherID + ''', loai_ct = ''2'', dien_giai = c.dien_giai, ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct0, ngay_lct = c.ngay_ct, so_ct = c.so_ct0, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = 'update #ap set ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct, ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct from #ap a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where a.ngay_ct0 is null; update #ap set so_ct = b.so_ct, so_ct0 = b.so_ct from #ap a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where isnull(a.so_ct0, '''') = ''''' exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostPayment '#m&Detail;', '#detailpost', 'tk', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '1', '2', '0' -- By Tax if @ct_yn = 1 begin select top 0 * into #tt30 from wrkap insert into #tt30 (loai_tt, ma_gd, stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_dvcs, loai_ct, ma_ct, ngay_lct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_kh, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, dien_giai, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_vv, ma_sp, tk, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_tien_nt, t_tien, t_tien_nt0, t_tien0, t_cp_nt, t_cp, t_nk_nt, t_nk, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_tt_nt, t_tt, t_tt_nt0, t_tt0, ma_tt, t_tt_qd, t_tt_qd0, tat_toan, ngay_tt, tt_nt, tt, tt_qd, t_tt_nt1, t_tt1, tt_cn, ty_gia_dg, tien_cl_no, tien_cl_co, stt_rec_pb, stt_rec_tt, nam, ky, line_nbr, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2, ma_hd, ma_ku, ma_phi, so_dh, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, ngay_td1, ngay_td2, ngay_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, s8, s9) select 0, '2', left(t.stt_rec, 10) + max(t.stt_rec0), max(t.stt_rec0), max(a.ma_dvcs), '2', @voucherID, max(a.ngay_ct), max(t.ngay_ct0), dbo.ff_PadL(t.so_ct0, @max1), max(a.ma_kh), t.ngay_ct0, dbo.ff_PadL(t.so_ct0, @max1), max(a.dien_giai), max(t.ma_bp), max(t.so_lsx), max(t.ma_vv), max(t.ma_sp), max(a.tk), max(a.ma_nt), max(a.ty_gia), 0, 0, sum(t.t_tien_nt), sum(t.t_tien), 0, 0, 0, 0, sum(t.t_thue_nt), sum(t.t_thue), sum(t.t_tien_nt + t.t_thue_nt), sum(t.t_tien + t.t_thue), sum(t.t_tien_nt + t.t_thue_nt), sum(t.t_tien + t.t_thue), max(a.ma_tt), 0, 0, 0, null, 0, 0, null, 0, 0, null, null, null, null, null, null, 0, 0, max(t.line_nbr), @status, @d0, @d0, @user, @user, max(t.ma_hd), max(t.ma_ku), max(t.ma_phi), '', '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null, '', '', '', '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null from #r&Tax; t join #m&Detail; a on a.stt_rec = t.stt_rec group by t.stt_rec, t.so_ct0, t.ngay_ct0, t.so_seri0 update #tt30 set t_tt_qd = t_tt_nt0, tat_toan = 1, ngay_tt = ngay_ct where @cNoAccounts <> '' and (dbo.ff_inlist(tk, @cNoAccounts) = 1) update #tt30 set ma_nt = '', t_tien_nt = 0, t_tien_nt0 = 0, t_thue_nt = 0, t_tt_nt = 0, t_tt_nt0 = 0, ty_gia = 0 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency insert into cttt30 select * from #tt30 drop table #tt30 end -- Tax if exists(select 1 from #r&Tax;) begin @@inserting(inputTax); end -- Inventory select @Numeric = 'nam, ky, cp_vc, cp_vc_nt, cp_bh, cp_bh_nt, cp_khac, cp_khac_nt, cp_nt, cp, thue_suat_nk, nk_nt, nk, thue_suat_ttdb, thue_suat, ttdb_nt, ttdb, ct_dc&PGMasterFieldZeroStock.ext;, pn_gia_tb, gia_nt21, gia21, gia_nt2, gia2, tien_nt2, tien2, cp_thue_yn, ck_nt, ck, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6' select @String = 'so_lo, ma_nk, so_seri, ma_vi_trin, tk_gv, tk_dt, tk_thue_nk, tk_thue_ttdb, so_dh2, so_dh3, ma_nvbh, ma_nv, stt_rec_px, stt_rec0px, stt_rec_dc, stt_rec_pn, stt_rec0pn, stt_rec_yc, stt_rec0yc, so_seri0, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' select @External = 'ngay_lct = c.ngay_ct, tk_thue_no = '''', loai_ct = ''2'', ma_gd = ''2'', datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', tk_du = c.tk, tk_ck = b.tk_cpxt, ma_khon = c.ma_kh_x, gia_nt01 = b.gia_nt0, gia01 = b.gia0, gia_nt1 = b.gia_nt, gia1 = b.gia, tien_xuat = 0, tien_nt_x = 0, tien_nhap = b.tien, tien_nt_n = b.tien_nt' select @statement = 'select * into #r from #in' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'update #r set nxt = 2, sl_xuat = a.sl_nhap, sl_xuat1 = a.sl_nhap1, sl_nhap = 0, sl_nhap1 = 0, tien_nhap = 0, tien_nt_n = 0, ' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'tk_du = a.tk_ck, ma_kh = a.ma_khon, ma_ct = ''' + @voucherIDIssue + ''', stt_rec = left(a.stt_rec, 10) + ''' + @voucherIDIssue + ''', stt_rec_pn = '''', stt_rec0pn = '''', stt_rec_yc = '''', stt_rec0yc = '''', ma_tt = '''', ' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'tien_xuat = case when a.px_gia_dd = 0 then 0 else a.tien_nhap end, tien_nt_x = case when a.px_gia_dd = 0 then 0 else a.tien_nt_x end, gia = case when a.px_gia_dd = 0 then 0 else a.gia end, gia_nt = case when a.px_gia_dd = 0 then 0 else a.gia_nt end, gia1 = case when a.px_gia_dd = 0 then 0 else a.gia1 end, gia_nt1 = case when a.px_gia_dd = 0 then 0 else a.gia_nt1 end' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'from #r join #in a on #r.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and #r.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'update #in set ma_nx = tk_du, px_gia_dd = 0, ma_khon = '''', tk_ck = ''''' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'update #in set ma_nx = b.ma_nx from #in a join dmnx b on a.ma_nx = b.tk where b.ma_nx is not null' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'update #r set tk_ck = ''''' select @statement = @statement + char(13) + 'insert into #in select * from #r' exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostInventory '#m&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', @voucherID, '#k', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, 1, 1 end if @status = '1' begin select @fieldSelect = 'stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ''' + @voucherID + ''', ngay_ct, so_ct, t_tt_nt , t_tt, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai, ''' + @datetime0 + ''', ' + rtrim(@user) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostLater '#m&Detail;', @voucherID, @fieldSelect, '' end if @status = '2' begin select @glAcctField = 'tk_vt', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk', @glAmountField = 'tien', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt', @glKey = '1=1', @glNoAccList = '0', @glNoAccListRef = '0' select @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_nk, so_lo, so_dh, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3' select @External = 'ct_nxt = 1, ma_gd = ''2'', dien_giai_h = b.dien_giai, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) select @Statement = 'update #gl set ct_nxt = 2, ma_gd = '''', datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user) + 'where ma_ct = ''' + @voucherIDIssue + '''' select @glGroupReceipt = groupby from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @voucherID select @glGroupIssue = groupby from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @voucherIDIssue select @glGroupReceipt = replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(', ' + @glGroupReceipt, ', ma_td1', ''), ', ma_td2', ''), ', ma_td3', ''), ', s1', ''), ', s2', ''), ', s3', ''), ', ', ', a.') select @glGroupIssue = replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(', ' + @glGroupIssue, ', ma_td1', ''), ', ma_td2', ''), ', ma_td3', ''), ', s1', ''), ', s2', ''), ', s3', ''), ', ', ', a.') -- Struct select top 0 a.*, cast('2' as char(2)) as loai_ct, b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, b.ngay_ct0, b.so_ct0, b.ma_dvcs, cast('' as char(3)) as ma_ct, b.ngay_ct as ngay_lct, b.ma_nt, b.ty_gia, b.dien_giai as dien_giai_h, b.dien_giai, b.tk into #dGL from #d&Detail; a, #m&Detail; b, #r&Tax; c -- GL Receipt select @q = 'insert into #dGL(stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, tien_nt, tien, tk_vt, ma_nx, tk_cpxt, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, loai_ct, ma_kh, ma_kh_ref, ma_vt, ma_dvcs, ma_ct, ngay_lct, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai_h, dien_giai, tk)' select @q = @q + ' select a.stt_rec, max(a.stt_rec0), max(a.line_nbr), max(a.ngay_ct), max(a.so_ct), max(b.ngay_ct0), max(b.so_ct0), sum(a.tien_nt), sum(a.tien), a.tk_vt, max(a.ma_nx), max(a.tk_cpxt), ' select @q = @q + 'max(a.ma_vv), max(a.ma_bp), max(a.so_lsx), max(a.ma_sp), max(a.ma_hd), max(a.ma_phi), max(a.ma_ku), ''2'', b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh, '''', ' select @q = @q + 'max(b.ma_dvcs), ''' + @voucherID + ''' as ma_ct, max(b.ngay_ct) as ngay_lct, max(b.ma_nt), max(b.ty_gia), '''', max(b.dien_giai), b.tk' select @q = @q + ' from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where not ((''' + @cNoAccounts + ''' <> '''') and (dbo.ff_inlist(b.tk, ''' + @cNoAccounts + ''') = 1))' select @q = @q + ' group by a.stt_rec, b.ma_kh, a.tk_vt, b.tk' + @glGroupReceipt exec sp_executesql @q -- GL Tax select *, ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, cast('' as char(32)) as tk, cast('' as nvarchar(512)) as dien_giai_i into #glVAT from #r&Tax; where t_thue_nt + t_thue <> 0 update #glVAT set ma_kh2 = '' where tk_thue_no in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 0) update #glVAT set ma_kh = case when a.ma_kh2 <> '' then a.ma_kh2 else b.ma_kh end, ma_kh_ref = b.ma_kh, tk = b.tk, dien_giai_i = b.dien_giai from #glVAT a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec select @maxLineNumber = max(line_nbr) from #dGL select @maxLineNumber = isnull(@maxLineNumber, 0) if @taxPost = '0' begin select @q = 'insert into #dGL (stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, loai_ct, so_ct, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, tk_vt, tien_nt, tien, ma_kh, ma_kh_ref, ma_vt, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, ma_nt, ty_gia, tk, ma_ct, ngay_lct, ma_dvcs, dien_giai)' select @q = @q + ' select a.stt_rec, max(a.stt_rec0), ' + rtrim(@maxLineNumber) + ' + max(a.line_nbr), max(a.ngay_ct), max(a.loai_ct), max(a.so_ct), max(a.ngay_ct0), max(a.so_ct0), a.tk_thue_no, sum(a.t_thue_nt), sum(a.t_thue), a.ma_kh, a.ma_kh_ref, '''', '''', '''', '''', '''', '''', '''', '''', max(a.ma_nt), max(a.ty_gia), a.tk, ''' + @voucherID + ''', max(a.ngay_ct), max(a.ma_dvcs), max(a.dien_giai_i)' select @q = @q + ' from #glVAT a where not ((''' + @cNoAccounts + ''' <> '''') and (dbo.ff_inlist(a.tk, ''' + @cNoAccounts + ''') = 1))' select @q = @q + ' group by a.stt_rec, a.ma_kh, a.ma_kh_ref, a.tk_thue_no, a.tk' exec sp_executesql @q end else begin select @q = 'insert into #dGL (stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, loai_ct, so_ct, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, tk_vt, tien_nt, tien, ma_kh, ma_kh_ref, ma_vt, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, ma_nt, ty_gia, tk, ma_ct, ngay_lct, ma_dvcs, dien_giai)' select @q = @q + ' select a.stt_rec, max(a.stt_rec0), ' + rtrim(@maxLineNumber) + ' + max(a.line_nbr), max(a.ngay_ct), max(a.loai_ct), max(a.so_ct), max(a.ngay_ct0), max(a.so_ct0), a.tk_thue_no, sum(a.t_thue_nt), sum(a.t_thue), a.ma_kh, a.ma_kh_ref, '''', a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku, max(a.ma_nt), max(a.ty_gia), a.tk, ''' + @voucherID + ''', max(a.ngay_ct), max(a.ma_dvcs), max(a.dien_giai_i)' select @q = @q + ' from #glVAT a where not ((''' + @cNoAccounts + ''' <> '''') and (dbo.ff_inlist(a.tk, ''' + @cNoAccounts + ''') = 1))' select @q = @q + ' group by a.stt_rec, a.ma_kh, a.ma_kh_ref, a.tk_thue_no, a.tk, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku' exec sp_executesql @q end -- GL Issue select @q = 'insert into #dGL(stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, tien_nt, tien, tk_vt, ma_nx, tk_cpxt, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, loai_ct, ma_kh, ma_kh_ref, ma_vt, ma_dvcs, ma_ct, ngay_lct, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai_h, dien_giai, tk)' select @q = @q + ' select left(a.stt_rec, 10) + ''' + @voucherIDIssue + ''', max(a.stt_rec0), max(a.line_nbr), max(a.ngay_ct), max(a.so_ct), case when max(rtrim(a.px_gia_dd)) = ''0'' then 0 else sum(a.tien_nt) end, case when max(rtrim(a.px_gia_dd)) = ''0'' then 0 else sum(a.tien) end, a.tk_cpxt, max(a.ma_nx), '''', ' select @q = @q + 'max(a.ma_vv), max(a.ma_bp), max(a.so_lsx), max(a.ma_sp), max(a.ma_hd), max(a.ma_phi), max(a.ma_ku), '''', b.ma_kh_x, b.ma_kh_x, '''', ' select @q = @q + 'max(b.ma_dvcs), ''' + @voucherIDIssue + ''' as ma_ct, max(b.ngay_ct) as ngay_lct, max(b.ma_nt), max(b.ty_gia), max(b.dien_giai), max(b.dien_giai), a.tk_vt' select @q = @q + ' from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where (a.tk_vt <> a.tk_cpxt) and (not (''' + @cNoAccounts + '''<> '''' and dbo.ff_inlist(tk_cpxt, ''' + @cNoAccounts + ''') = 1))' select @q = @q + ' group by a.stt_rec, b.ma_kh_x, a.tk_vt, a.tk_cpxt' + @glGroupIssue exec sp_executesql @q exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostGL '#m&Detail;', '#dGL', @voucherID, @glAcctField, @glAcctFieldRef, @glAmountField, @glFCAmountField, @glKey, @glNoAccList, @glNoAccListRef, '', @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '#k', '1' end
